price: Zipo nyuso siku hiyo zitao ng'ara,
footnotes: Siku hiyo zitakuwapo nyuso nzuri, zenye kumwangalia Mola wao Mlezi bila ya kusema kwa sifa gani, wajihi gani, au masafa gani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
